game.title: Ascendance
game.synopsis: In a world on the brink of war, a young hero named Kael must rise to save the kingdom. With the help of his friends, he must uncover the secrets of an ancient prophecy and defeat the evil forces that threaten to destroy the world.
game.beginning: The game begins with Kael, a young man training to become a warrior in his village. Suddenly, he is attacked by a group of monsters. He is rescued by a mysterious woman who reveals that he is the chosen one, destined to save the kingdom from an evil force known as the Shadow Lord.
game.ending: After many trials and tribulations, Kael and his friends finally reach the Shadow Lord's castle. They confront the Shadow Lord in a final battle. With the power of the ancient prophecy, they are able to defeat him. Peace is restored to the kingdom, and Kael is hailed as a hero.
